title: The Mrs. Degree
description: Penelope Halbrook never intended to get pregnant in college, never intended to drop out, never intended to be a single mom.She thought by leaving Jackson Jennings, was doing him a favor—he had a bright future ahead of him; the last thing he needed was her (and a baby) standing in his way.She thought he would forget about her.She thought she would never see him in person again.How very wrong she was... about everything.
author: Sara Ney
